mapper.select: select ho.hostNo, ho.usersNo, us.name, us.path, ho.zipcode, ho.adress1, ho.adress2, ho.adress3, ho.x, ho.y, ho.intro, ho.asking from users us, host ho where hostNo = #{hostNo} and us.usersNo = ho.usersNo
select kw.hostNo, kn.keywordName from keyword kw, keywordname kn where kw.keywordNo = kn.keywordNo and kw.hostNo = #{hostNo} order by kn.keywordNo asc
